description.value:
You can push larger foes around with your attack. You can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Aggressive Block] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Brutish Shove] against a creature up to two sizes larger than you.

When a creature you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] has to stop moving because it would hit an object, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum 1). This happens regardless of how you Shoved the creature.
